Maison Whiskerfall

Promenade Attractions Gravity Charter Admission
Winter Season 1907

The park opens at dawn when the moon is still visible.

Under the stewardship of Madame Purrceline, age nineteen in cat years and beyond arithmetic in all others, the gardens of Whiskerfall offer a measured day of velvet thrill. Gravity is provided by request.

Guests are asked to arrive in polished shoes and a calm spirit. Our quality officers inspect every stitch, bolt, and heartbeat before the gates are unlatched.

Signature Passage

The Ascension Carousel

Twelve lacquered horses, one brass swan, and a ceiling that occasionally forgets where the floor belongs. Conducted by string quartet at the top of each hour.

Whisper "steady paws" to the attendant for the slow orbit route.

Patron Charter

On Optional Gravity

In Whiskerfall, weight is a courtesy, not a law. Guests may select grounded, ballroom, or cloudlight mode prior to boarding designated attractions.

Cloudlight guests should keep gloves on while drifting. Sudden laughter can alter altitude. If a supervising cat rings the silver bell, return gently to the nearest carpeted surface.
